contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 14, 1988 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-third-section
Appalachian Mountain Folk Song Suite
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Appalachian Mountain Folk Song Suite. 13 bands competed.
1st Prize: £200.00 (Copperad trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Festival trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Audi trophy) 4th Prize: £40.00 Supplementary information taken from contest programme
March 7, 2011, 5:53 p.m. Sept. 2, 2014, 8:14 a.m.
